ing: 1/2 cup cooked quinoa, or more to taste
1/4 cup chopped fresh mint, or to taste
1/4 cup chopped fresh spinach, or more to taste
n: Grape, Lime, and Quinoa Salad Surprise
des: "A great summer salad that's healthy and delicious. Throw in some cooked shrimp to make it into a meal."
ins:
Toss grapes, cucumber, quinoa, mint, spinach, and almonds together in a large bowl; sprinkle salt over the top.
Whisk grapeseed oil and lime juice together in a small bowl; pour over quinoa mixture and toss to coat. Refrigerate until flavors combine, at least 3 hours.
